The Government has obtained the title deed from them and has received from the Housing Development Corporation a confirmation that there are no dues on the house sites enjoyed by the rightful owners for more than 10 years.
The application for the title deed/title deed certificate as explained above is for the purpose of granting them full and permanent rights under the Sampurna Gruha Haqq Scheme. 2. To register this document.
Subject to AP Assigned Lands (POT) (AMENDMENT), section 3 (2A) and Section 3 (2B); and GO MS no 314, Revenue (Lands-I) Department, dated: 11/11/2021, this document is hereby granted.
Therefore, from now on, you may freely enjoy the said Scheduled Property as per your wish up to your son and grandson with the powers of donation, exchange, sale and disposal. If you do so, neither you nor your heirs nor your representatives nor the Government of Andhra Pradesh or their representatives shall have any claim or dispute in future against you or your heirs or your representatives. All taxes payable on the said immovable property shall be borne by you in your name. Payable.

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL:KOTHAPALLI/KOTHAPALLIW-B: 4-0 SURVEY: 276/2HOUSE:4-4/28c EXTENT:50.296SQ.Yds BUILT:298SQ. FT Boundires: [N]:CC ROAD [S] MPPBUILDING [E]: GAMPALABHASKAR [W]:GAMPLALA PRASAD

sections.content:
The property covered under Sale Deed No. 66014 of 2022, dated 19/Jan/2022, executed by the Government of Andhra Pradesh represented by Gokavaram Tahsildar K Posi Babu, in favour of Katheti Chittamma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 50.2963 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 4-28c, comprised in survey number 276/2, situated in Kothapalle Village & Grama Panchayati, Gokavaram Mandal, within the District of East Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Korukonda, is bounded as follows:

North by: CC Road
South by: MPP Building
East by: Gampala Bhaskar
West by: Gampala Prasad
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the scheduled property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is observed from the recitals of the deed that the SRO Name is mentioned as Kothapalli, whereas, the document is registered before the SRO Korukonda, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to verify the same. Further, It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
